name: books
body:
### Welcome to the DBS UI Team Repo.
Hello all, I created this page so we could have someplace to share bookmarks, snippets, books, etc. I figured this would keep all those things in a central location and we would have to dig through emails and we could get to them even if we weren't logged into the VPN.

If you have anything you want to add, just let me know or email it over to me and I'll get it added.

###Bookmarks
Here are a few links I have collected over the years.

####Tools

* site building
  * [20 second gut check](http://goodkickoffmeetings.com/2010/04/the-20-second-gut-test/)
  * [atomic design](http://bradfrost.com/blog/post/atomic-web-design/)
  * [prototyping](http://goodkickoffmeetings.com/2010/04/design-studioprototyping-exercise/)
  * [element collage](http://danielmall.com/articles/rif-element-collages/)
  * [north](https://github.com/north/north)
  * [HTML symbols](http://htmlarrows.com/)
* [litmus](https://litmus.com/tests)
* [kirby](http://getkirby.com/)
* [kirby cheat sheet](http://getkirby.com/content/02-docs/kirby-cheatsheet.pdf)
* [markdown cheat sheet](http://packetlife.net/media/library/16/Markdown.pdf)
* [analytics](https://sumall.com/)
* [entity lookup](http://entity-lookup.leftlogic.com/)
* [hex to rgb](http://hex.colorrrs.com/)
* [color functions](http://sassme.arc90.com/)
* [stack](https://macropod.com/stack/)
* [avocode](http://avocode.com/)
* [google starter kit](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/tools/)
* [ux project checklist](http://uxchecklist.github.io/)
* [google fonts](https://github.com/googlefonts)
* [JSONLint](http://pro.jsonlint.com/)
* [url encode](http://www.url-encode-decode.com/)
* [Moxtra](https://www.moxtra.com/service/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
